channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bhattacharya’s Battle for NIH Is Worth Fighting
item.description: Trump’s nominee to the prominent and troubled public-health agency could bring much-needed reform.

item.title: The Crumbled Omnibus Carcass Is A Mess Of Speaker Johnson’s Own Making
item.description: The scam stopgap measure included a pay hike for Congress and a provision allowing members to opt out of Obamacare.

item.title: Have We Found a Cure for TDS?
item.description: Trump gets strange new respect.

item.title: Dems complain 'President Musk' running the show on GOP spending drama
item.description: House Democrats are complaining over being kept in Washington, D.C., as lawmakers scramble to avoid a government shutdown just days before Christmas.

item.title: Rand Paul suggests replacing Mike Johnson with Elon Musk as Speaker of the House
item.description: Sen. Rand Paul has floated the idea of replacing House Speaker Mike Johnson with Elon Musk after the chaotic collapse of the continuing resolution spe...

item.title: Biden admin officials noticed stamina issues in president's first few months in office: report
item.description: Current and former members of President Biden's White House told the Wall Street Journal that they saw evidence of Biden's waning energy even in 2021.

item.title: Motivated Reasoning Has No Home Here
item.description: Thank you for your belief that principles matter and for sticking with us, even when it is unpopular.

item.title: Trump says House Speaker Mike Johnson needs to be 'tough' to remain in leadership post
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump said Thursday that House Speaker Mike Johnson needs to act "decisively and tough" if he wants to remain in his position.

item.title: Biden Administration Attacks Idaho’s Pro-Life Law With Taxpayer-Funded Lies About Emergency Care
item.description: The Biden administration is using taxpayer dollars to push lies about abortion and is suing Idaho over its pro-life law.

item.title: Some House Republicans privately furious at Elon Musk after government shutdown talks implode
item.description: Some House Republicans are privately fuming at Elon Musk's 11th-hour involvement in government funding talks.

item.title: Herbert Hoover’s Quest to Roll Back the Federal Government: A Lesson for the DOGE
item.description: The DOGE should study and learn from Hoover’s experience crusading against government waste if it wants to succeed.

item.title: The Failed Omnibus Would Have Let The J6 Committee Off The Hook For Framing Trump
item.description: Democrats are trying to insulate their Jan 6. probe from scrutiny because they know they destroyed and suppressed evidence.

item.title: Trump broke ground campaigning on pardons, legal experts say
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has vowed to pardon at least some of the participants in the Jan. 6, 2021, riot at the U.S. Capitol shortly after his ina...

item.title: Senate passes defense bill that will raise troop pay and aims to counter China's power
item.description: The Senate passed a defense bill Wednesday that authorizes significant pay raises for junior enlisted service members, aims to counter China's growing...

item.title: Here's what's in the spending bill that's drawing the ire of Elon Musk, Vivek Ramaswamy
item.description: Congressional leadership unveiled legislation Wednesday to punt the government funding deadline down the road, but that bill was pronounced dead only ...

item.title: The Left’s Takeover Of ‘Science’ Is Obvious When It Comes To Sex Differences
item.description: Bill Maher’s exchange with popular science commentator Neil deGrasse Tyson underscores how extraordinarily unscientific scientists can be.

item.title: Republicans Target FACE Act After DOJ Used It To Put Pro-Lifers In Prison
item.description: Many pro-life advocates face stiff penalties due to the DOJ's use of the FACE Act.

item.title: We Don’t Need a Constitutional Convention
item.description: Politicians have perfected the art of not doing their jobs.
